title: Moneycontrol: West Bengal couple sells 8-month-old son to buy iPhone 14 for making Instagram Reels
selftext: This best them all. The "Reeladdicts". Yes, that's what I call them. Stupid ppl.
comments: The dark side of trying to be influencer(s)...
I can't believe such lack of awareness and sense of responsibility. Clearly Samsung S23 Ultra has a better camera!!
People are becoming more & more materialistic.

Height of stupidity, cannot belive such people are reproducing..

Seriously, if they waited for 2 more months, they could get iPhone 15
You had me in the first half, not gonna lie
